name: BioloMix 6L DC Quiet Motor Timer Display Food Stand Mixer Cream Egg Whisk Cake Flour Dough mesin pengadun adunan tepung 和面机 1200W
description:
【1200W Powerful DC Motor & Accurate 6 + P Speed Control】The BioloMix BM-601 stand mixer uses a max 1200W high-end pure copper DC quiet motor with high operating efficiency, equipped with hall sensors and additional pulse settings. 6 optimized speeds with timer function easily knead doughs, thick batters, meringues and whipped cream.

【Low Operating Noise ≤60 dB】 BioloMix kitchen mixer adopts high-quality DC motor and innovative consctruction, which contributes to low operating noise (maximum ≤60 dB), The splash guard with access hatch helps add ingredients without making a mess. Rubber suction feet for extra stability.

【6L Large Capacity】 BioloMix is equipped with a 6L food-grade stainless steel bowl with dual handles which are more convenient to hold. which can efficiently accommodate family gatherings of 8-10 people. With all metal hardened wire whisk and oversized Teflon coating dough hook, flat beater . Dishwasher safe.

【Clear LED Timer Display & Tilt Head Design】BioloMix dough mixer featured a digital display to show the operation time, it allows you can do other things at the same time when the mixer is working which effectively saves your time. Our multifunctional baking mixer aslo built in overheating protection and will automatically shut the machine off when motor gets overheating. The tilt head design not only switch the accessories conveniently but also take down the bowl easily.

【No Mess in Splash-proof & Anti-slip Compact Design】The Kitchen Food Standing Mixer helps you to keep the kitchen tidy, there is a splash guard to avoid ingredients to spray out. The Electric Mixer covers 35.1 x 28.5 x 31.2 cm, it truly saves space and time. The Stand mixer comes with anti-skid silicone suction feet which is more stable and safer, it helps to reduce the noise as well.

Max. Power (W):1200W
Voltage (V): 220 - 240V
Frequency: 50 / 60Hz
Capacity: 6L
Package Contents:1 x Mixer, 1 x Mixing Bowl, 1 x Beater, 1 x Dough Hook, 1 x Whisk, 1 x English Manual， 1X Warranty card.

Buyer notice:
1. the whisk is made of stainless steel. 
2.The dough hooks and the flat beater are made of aluminium alloy, they are light and sturdy, but can not wash in dishwasher. The heat in dishwasher will corrode the electrodeposited coating of utensils.
3.The bowl and the wire whip are made of stainless steel, diswasher safe, other parts are NOT dishwasher safe.
4.The utensils are well made and very strong, just make sure when fitting you align the fitting up with the connector and twist to secure it before use.
5. Max Capacity: 1500g flour
